Description: Sunny and warm 2nd floor duplex; this unit is the 2nd floor of a duplex located on N. 25th Street near the intersection of Junett and N. 25th. The unit is being advertised for a single person or couple but not as a roommate rental. It has separate locked entry with extra storage space available in the basement. It is unfurnished. All utilities covered are covered in the rent, it is located in a quiet, well-established neighborhood, less than a 1/2 mile from campus, and the lease terms are negotiable.
